scene_description_enriched: A young woman with auburn hair, wearing a rich, dark red robe adorned with gold patterns, is depicted kneeling. She holds two golden palm fronds, symbols of martyrdom, in her hands. A golden halo encircles her head. The background is a stylized landscape with green hills and a blue sky, featuring a dark, cave-like opening in a rocky outcrop. The overall impression is one of serene devotion, likely representing a female saint.
